# Canid
The Canid (Cay-Nid) are similar to Felinids, except a hydrid of dog traits on a human frame. Hailing from a colony of genetic engineers, the species has become distinct enough to be classed by itself.
## Diet
- Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Smaller than humans on average, and slightly harder to hit because of that. - Can use their hightened olfactory senses to track scents. - Can bark, growl, and snarl like a vulpkanin.
## Drawbacks
- They take increased slash, blunt, and heat damage. - Colorblind by nature, though different eyes can offset this. - Lower stamina than other species.
